all_minus.table: Bam_to_signals/Replicate ${i+1}/signal track of all reads from minus strand
all_minus.ucsc_track: track type=bigWig name="rep${i+1} all minus" priority=${i+1} visibility=full smoothingWindow=off windowingFunction=mean+whiskers autoScale=off negateValues=on viewLimits=-1:0 transformFunc=LOG maxHeightPixels=64:18:8

all_plus.table: Bam_to_signals/Replicate ${i+1}/signal track of all reads from plus strand
all_plus.ucsc_track: track type=bigWig name="rep${i+1} all plus" priority=${i+1} visibility=full smoothingWindow=off windowingFunction=mean+whiskers autoScale=off viewLimits=0:1 transformFunc=LOG maxHeightPixels=64:18:8

all_unstranded.ucsc_track: track type=bigWig name="rep${i+1} all" priority=${i+1} visibility=full smoothingWindow=off windowingFunction=mean+whiskers autoScale=off viewLimits=0:1 transformFunc=LOG maxHeightPixels=64:18:8

unique_minus.table: Bam_to_signals/Replicate ${i+1}/signal track of unique reads from minus strand
unique_minus.ucsc_track: track type=bigWig name="rep${i+1} unique minus" priority=${i+1} visibility=full smoothingWindow=off windowingFunction=mean+whiskers autoScale=off negateValues=on viewLimits=-1:0 transformFunc=LOG maxHeightPixels=64:18:8

unique_plus.table: Bam_to_signals/Replicate ${i+1}/signal track of unique reads from plus strand
unique_plus.ucsc_track: track type=bigWig name="rep${i+1} unique plus" priority=${i+1} visibility=full smoothingWindow=off windowingFunction=mean+whiskers autoScale=off viewLimits=0:1 transformFunc=LOG maxHeightPixels=64:18:8

unique_unstranded.ucsc_track: track type=bigWig name="rep${i+1} unique" priority=${i+1} visibility=full smoothingWindow=off windowingFunction=mean+whiskers autoScale=off viewLimits=0:1 transformFunc=LOG maxHeightPixels=64:18:8
